headings: Examples,Example 3: Send a command to a device, synchronously
content:
Request:
curl -s -X POST -H "X-ESTHESIS-DT-APP: $ESTHESIS_DT_TOKEN" \
    "$ESTHESIS_CORE_DT_URL/v1/command/device/dash-dev-1/execute" --data "uname -a" | jq
Reply:
dt-example3.png
pageTitle: Example 3: Send a command to a device, synchronously
